titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to convey to the city of Murfreesboro, Tennessee, certain real property located at the Department of Veterans Affairs medical center in Murfreesboro, Tennessee.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 10/18/1999--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to convey to the city of Murfreesboro, Tennessee, a specified portion of the Department of Veterans Affairs medical center in Murfreesboro. Requires such land to be used for public purposes only.
